law.history: Repealed 1987 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 72(2), effective January 4, 1988; amended ch. 1, sec. 50. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 27. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 2. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 2. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 276, sec. 4. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4968-8.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Employer carrying own risk to pay maintenance fund tax.
